001package com.technototes.library.hardware.motor;
002
003import com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.DcMotor;
004import com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.DcMotorEx;
005import com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.DcMotorSimple;
006import com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.PIDFCoefficients;
007import com.technototes.library.hardware.Sensored;
008import com.technototes.library.hardware.sensor.encoder.Encoder;
009import com.technototes.library.hardware.sensor.encoder.MotorEncoder;
010
011/**
012 * Class for encoded motors
013 *
014 * @param <T> The qualcomm motor device interface
015 * @author Alex Stedman
016 */
017@SuppressWarnings("unused")
018public class EncodedMotor<T extends DcMotorSimple> extends Motor<T> implements Sensored {
019
020    /**
021     * Deadzone for going to positions with encoder
022     */
023    public double positionThreshold = 50;
024
025    private Encoder encoder;
026    private DcMotor.RunMode runMode;
027
028    /**
029     * Make encoded motor
030     *
031     * @param device The dcmotor object
032     * @param e      The encoder for the motor
033     */
034    public EncodedMotor(T device, Encoder e, String nm) {
035        super(device, nm);
036        encoder = e;
037    }
038
039    /**
040     * Make encoded motor
041     *
042     * @param device The name of the motor
043     * @param e      The encoder for the motor
044     */
045    public EncodedMotor(String device, Encoder e) {
046        super(device);
047        encoder = e;
048    }
049
050    /**
051     * Make encoded motor, with the default encoder configured
052     *
053     * @param device The dcmotor object
054     */
055    public EncodedMotor(T device, String nm) {
056        super(device, nm);
057        if (device instanceof DcMotorEx) {
058            encoder = new MotorEncoder((DcMotorEx) device, nm);
059        }
060    }
061
062    /**
063     * Make encoded motor, with the default encoder configured
064     *
065     * @param deviceName The dcmotor device name in hardware map
066     */
067    public EncodedMotor(String deviceName) {
068        super(deviceName);
069        T device = getRawDevice();
070        if (device instanceof DcMotorEx) {
071            encoder = new MotorEncoder((DcMotorEx) device, deviceName);
072        }
073    }
074
075    /**
076     * Explicitly set the encoder for the motor
077     *
078     * @param enc The encoder
079     * @return The motor (for chaining)
080     */
081    public EncodedMotor<T> setEncoder(Encoder enc) {
082        encoder = enc;
083        return this;
084    }
085
086    /**
087     * Configure the PIDF constants for the motor
088     *
089     * @param p The Proportional coefficient
090     * @param i The Integral coefficient
091     * @param d The Derivative coefficient
092     * @param f The Forward Feedback coefficient
093     * @return The motor (for chaining)
094     */
095    public EncodedMotor<T> setPIDFCoefficients(double p, double i, double d, double f) {
096        T device = getRawDevice();
097        if (device instanceof DcMotorEx) {
098            ((DcMotorEx) device).setVelocityPIDFCoefficients(p, i, d, f);
099        }
100        return this;
101    }
102
103    /**
104     * Configure the PIDF constants for the motor
105     *
106     * @param coefficients The PIDF coefficients to set
107     * @return The motor (for chaining)
108     */
109    public EncodedMotor<T> setPIDFCoefficients(PIDFCoefficients coefficients) {
110        return setPIDFCoefficients(coefficients.p, coefficients.i, coefficients.d, coefficients.f);
111    }
112
113    /**
114     * Configure the PIDF constants for the motor
115     *
116     * @param c The PIDF coefficients to set
117     * @return The motor (for chaining)
118     */
119    public EncodedMotor<T> setPIDFCoefficients(DcMotor.RunMode m, PIDFCoefficients c) {
120        T device = getRawDevice();
121        if (device instanceof DcMotorEx) {
122            ((DcMotorEx) device).setPIDFCoefficients(m, c);
123        }
124        return this;
125    }
126
127    /**
128     * Set the runmode for the motor
129     *
130     * @param m The RunMode to set
131     * @return The motor (for chaining)
132     */
133    public EncodedMotor<T> setRunMode(DcMotor.RunMode m) {
134        T device = getRawDevice();
135        if (device instanceof DcMotor) {
136            ((DcMotor) device).setMode(m);
137        }
138        runMode = m;
139        return this;
140    }
141
142    /**
143     * Set the motor to go *backward*
144     */
145    @Override
146    public EncodedMotor<T> setBackward() {
147        super.setBackward();
148        return this;
149    }
150
151    /**
152     * Set the motor to go *forward*
153     */
154    @Override
155    public EncodedMotor<T> setForward() {
156        super.setForward();
157        return this;
158    }
159
160    /**
161     * Set the motor to go in a particular direction
162     */
163    @Override
164    public EncodedMotor<T> setDirection(DcMotorSimple.Direction dir) {
165        super.setDirection(dir);
166        return this;
167    }
168
169    /**
170     * Get the encoder position value
171     *
172     * @return The encoder position value
173     */
174    @Override
175    public double getSensorValue() {
176        return encoder.getSensorValue();
177    }
178
179    //
180    //    @Override
181    //    public void setPIDValues(double p, double i, double d) {
182    //        coefficients = new PIDCoefficients(p, i, d);
183    //    }
184
185    //    @Override
186    //    public boolean setPositionPID(double val) {
187    //        if (!isAtPosition(val)) {
188    //            setSpeed(MathUtils.constrain(-0.1,(val-getSensorValue())/(coefficients.kP*10000), 0.1)*10);
189    //        } else {
190    //            setSpeed(0);
191    //            return true;
192    //        }
193    //        return false;
194    //    }
195
196    /**
197     * Set the position of the motor
198     *
199     * @param ticks The encoder ticks
200     * @return Is the motor at this position
201     */
202    public boolean setPosition(double ticks) {
203        return setPosition(ticks, 0.5);
204    }
205
206    /**
207     * Set the power for the motor to try to get to the position specified.
208     * This is not particularly useful, unfortunately. You probably want to go look
209     * at the MotorAsServoSubsystem code (which may or may not be in this repo currently)
210     *
211     * @param ticks The encoder ticks to try to go to
212     * @param speed The speed to run the motor at
213     * @return Is the motor at this position (with no deadzone at all)
214     */
215    public boolean setPosition(double ticks, double speed) {
216        if (!isAtPosition(ticks)) {
217            setPower(getSensorValue() < ticks ? speed : -speed);
218        } else {
219            setPower(0);
220            return true;
221        }
222        return false;
223    }
224
225    /**
226     * Is the motor at the specified position
227     *
228     * @param ticks The position
229     * @return Is the motor here or not
230     */
231    public boolean isAtPosition(double ticks) {
232        return Math.abs(ticks - getSensorValue()) < positionThreshold;
233    }
234
235    /**
236     * Get the encoder object
237     *
238     * @return The encoder
239     */
240    public Encoder getEncoder() {
241        return encoder;
242    }
243
244    /**
245     * Zero the encoder
246     *
247     * @return This
248     */
249    public EncodedMotor<T> tare() {
250        encoder.zeroEncoder();
251        return this;
252    }
253
254    @Override
255    public Double get() {
256        return getSensorValue();
257    }
258
259    /**
260     * Set velocity of motor in tps
261     *
262     * @param tps the speed in encoder ticks per second
263     */
264    public void setVelocity(double tps) {
265        T device = getRawDevice();
266        if (device instanceof DcMotor) {
267            setRunMode(DcMotor.RunMode.RUN_USING_ENCODER);
268            device.setPower(tps);
269        }
270    }
271
272    /**
273     * Get the power for the motor (Velocity, I guess?)
274     *
275     * @return the power for the motor
276     */
277    public double getVelocity() {
278        return getPower();
279    }
280
281    @Override
282    public EncodedMotor<T> brake() {
283        return (EncodedMotor<T>) super.brake();
284    }
285
286    @Override
287    public EncodedMotor<T> coast() {
288        return (EncodedMotor<T>) super.coast();
289    }
290
291    @Override
292    public EncodedMotor<T> setLimits(double mi, double ma) {
293        return (EncodedMotor<T>) super.setLimits(mi, ma);
294    }
295
296    // Ah, Java, you're such a hideous language...
297    public <U extends DcMotorSimple> U getRawMotor(Class<U> type) {
298        T device = getRawDevice();
299        return (device != null && type.isInstance(device)) ? type.cast(device) : null;
300    }
301}
